#summary The name of the chess pieces

= Introduction =

Every player has:
  * 1 [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/King_(chess) king]
  * 1 [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Queen_(chess) queen]
  * 2 [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rook_(chess) rooks]
  * 2 [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bishop_(chess) bishops]
  * 2 [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Knight_(chess) knights]
  * 8 [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pawn_(chess) pawns]
